SELECT CONCAT('normal_project',LPAD(CAST(SUBSTRING(MAX(normal_project_code),20)+1 as UNSIGNED),3,'0')), 'id001', #{normalProjectName}, #{joinCateCode}, (SELECT join_cate_name FROM join_cate WHERE join_cate_code = '#{joinCateCode}'), #{workCateCode}, (SELECT work_cate_name FROM work_cate WHERE work_cate_code = 'workCateCode'), #{subjectCateCode}, (SELECT subject_cate_name FROM subject_cate WHERE subject_cate_code='#{subjectCateCode}'), #{requiredSkill}, #{normalProjectDetail}, #{projectMaxPeopleNum}, 'normal_run_code01', (SELECT nr.run_name FROM normal_run AS nr WHERE nr.normal_run_code = 'normal_run_code01'), CURDATE(), #{projectAdvertiseFinishDate}, #{projectStartUpDate}, #{projectFinishDate}, #{projectDay}, 10, 500 FROM normal_project WHERE normal_project_code LIKE 'normal_project_code_%';
